announcements.message:
Good Morning Team! First of all I just want to welcome all new members to the group. The markets are opening at 5 pm EST today! 📊 As always we will be posting all of our charts in here before the market opens! 🔥  

 Tonight we will be having our Sunday Market Blitz at 8 pm EST which is a live trading session where we cover all of our technical analysis on 10+ pairs. 🎥 

 This is an amazing way to kick off the week and see where each pair could be making their next move. If there are opportunities for entry we will provide them for FREE on this live trading session 💰 

 The link will be dropped in here prior to this session and it will also be on youtube live 🚀 

 If you want to get started with any of our Premium Services please click below 👑 

 👉🏻 https://t.me/ForexLeagueMessageBot 👈🏻
Hey Team! We will be posting all of our analysis for the week later today as we prepare for market open at 5 pm EST!

We are hosting our small group webinars every single wednesday at 12 pm est and 3 pm est. Both sessions will run for 90 minutes. There will be only 7 spots available per webinar so make sure you register now! https://calendly.com/forexleaguehelp-1/forex-league-small-group-webinars?month=2022-03
Hey Team! Our live trading session will take place at 8 pm EST! Zoom link will be posted in here before. Talk to you guys soon 🔥

Here is the link to our live trading session you can join NOW 🔗 
 <https://us02web.Zoom.us/j/5273214305>

Here is the link to our live trading session you can join NOW 🔗 
 <https://us02web.Zoom.us/j/5273214305>

Thank you for joining our Sunday Market Blitz! Best of luck this week in the markets. ☘️  

 If you want any of our premium services including the Lifetime Course Membership, Rapid Signal Room, and Account Management use our sign up bot!  

 👉🏻  https://t.me/ForexLeagueMessageBot 👈🏻 

 You can catch the replay from the Sunday Market Blitz on our Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaghoaCcEoZih60zap3yH5A

I would like to welcome all new members to the Forex League Community make sure you head over to the <#588381918362337281> channel for some more information about getting started. Remember, the morning is the best part of the day to get ahead on your daily habits ☀️ The body is rested, the brain is fresh, and the possibilities of the day are endless. Head over to the <#576920775055900682> Channel for any of our premium services 🙏
For all the new members, if you submit a meme here you have a chance at winning a $25 giveaway.
For all the new members, if you submit a picture of your profits here you have a chance at winning a $25 giveaway.
Good morning Forex League❗ Let’s keep the momentum going today 💪 Whether your trading live, on a demo, or backtesting make the most of this opportunity!. 🙌
For all the new members, if you submit a meme here you have a chance at winning a $25 giveaway.
For all the new members, if you submit a picture of your profits here you have a chance at winning a $25 giveaway.
Go to the <#692752766325620806> channel which will have our watchlist as we head into the Asian session tonight it is completely FREE

The market is now CLOSED but the work begins NOW. The weekend is the perfect time to review this past week, backtest your system, or if you’re a beginner refresh on the basics. We want to be here to support you during this time. Check out all of our free live webinars here 🔗  https://myforexleague.teachable.com/courses/enrolled/595325
